description: Automated compliance monitoring system that tracks days worked per business-worker pairing per month. Issues warnings at day 15-18 and blocks new bookings at day 21, as required by Indonesian labor law PP 35/2021. Suggests alternative workers when limit is reached.
workflow_rationale: This is a multi-service feature that requires database schema changes, backend query functions, server actions, and multiple UI components. Following the FEATURE workflow ensures proper dependency order: database first, then backend queries, then actions, then frontend components, and finally integration.

phases.name: Database Schema
phases.description: Create compliance tracking table and related database functions for counting worker days per business per month

subtasks.description: Create compliance_tracking table to track monthly worker days per business

verification.expected: Table exists with columns: id, business_id, worker_id, month, days_worked, created_at, updated_at

subtasks.description: Create database function to calculate days worked for a worker-business pair in a month

verification.expected: Function returns count of accepted/completed bookings

subtasks.description: Create trigger to automatically update compliance_tracking when booking status changes to accepted or completed

verification.command: psql $DATABASE_URL -c "SELECT trigger_name FROM information_schema.triggers WHERE event_object_table = 'bookings'"
verification.expected: Trigger exists for updating compliance tracking

subtasks.description: Add RLS policies for compliance_tracking table

verification.command: psql $DATABASE_URL -c "SELECT policyname FROM pg_policies WHERE tablename = 'compliance_tracking'"
verification.expected: RLS policies exist for businesses, admins

phases.name: Backend Query Functions
phases.description: Create Supabase query functions to check compliance status and get worker days

subtasks.description: Create getWorkerDaysForMonth query function to count days worked by worker for business in a month
Create getComplianceStatus query function to check if worker can be booked (returns status, days count, warning level)
Create getComplianceRecords query function to get all compliance records for a business (for audit)
Create getAlternativeWorkers query function to suggest workers who haven't reached limit

phases.name: Server Actions
phases.description: Create server actions for compliance checking and enforcement

subtasks.description: Create checkComplianceBeforeAccept server action to verify worker can be accepted before booking
Update acceptApplication action to check compliance before accepting

verification.instructions: Review acceptApplication function - it should call checkComplianceBeforeAccept and block if limit reached

phases.name: Frontend UI Components
phases.description: Create compliance warning banners and alternative worker suggestion components

subtasks.description: Create ComplianceWarningBanner component to show warnings when approaching limits
Create ComplianceStatusBadge component to display worker compliance status in applicant cards
Create AlternativeWorkersSuggestion component to show other workers when limit is reached

phases.name: Frontend Integration
phases.description: Integrate compliance checks into business dashboard and applicant list

subtasks.description: Add compliance status fetching to business jobs page
subtasks.notes: Compliance status fetching was already implemented. The file includes: import of checkComplianceBeforeAccept, ComplianceStatusResult type, complianceStatusByApplicant state, fetching logic in fetchApplicants function (lines 137-154), and passing compliance data to ApplicantList component.

subtasks.description: Integrate ComplianceWarningBanner into applicant list
subtasks.notes: Added ComplianceWarningBanner integration: imported component, added getMostSevereComplianceIssue() helper function that prioritizes blocked status over warning, and displays banner after header when any applicant has compliance issues.

subtasks.description: Integrate ComplianceStatusBadge into WorkerApplicationCard
subtasks.notes: Added ComplianceStatusBadge integration: imported component and ComplianceStatusResult type, added optional compliance prop to WorkerApplicationCardProps, and displayed badge next to status badge in card header when compliance data is provided.

subtasks.description: Update BookingActions to disable accept button when compliance limit reached
subtasks.notes: Added complianceStatus prop to BookingActionsProps interface, imported ComplianceStatusResult type from compliance queries, added isComplianceBlocked check based on complianceStatus.status === 'blocked', created isAcceptDisabled to separate accept button disabled state from reject button, and updated accept button to use isAcceptDisabled (blocks when compliance limit reached). Reject button remains unaffected by compliance status.

subtasks.description: Add AlternativeWorkersSuggestion to applicant list when limit is reached
subtasks.notes: Added AlternativeWorkersSuggestion component integration: imported AlternativeWorker type and AlternativeWorkersSuggestion component, added new props (alternativeWorkers, isLoadingAlternativeWorkers, onSelectAlternativeWorker) to ApplicantListProps, and displayed AlternativeWorkersSuggestion after the table when complianceIssue.status === 'blocked'.

phases.name: Integration & Testing
phases.description: End-to-end verification of compliance guard functionality

subtasks.description: Verify database triggers update compliance_tracking when bookings are accepted

steps: Check compliance_tracking table has new or updated record

subtasks.notes: Created comprehensive verification materials including SQL script for database verification and detailed verification guide. Fixed TypeScript error in lib/actions/job-applications.ts (days_worked â†’ daysWorked).

subtasks.description: Verify warning appears at 15 days

steps: Setup: Create 15 accepted bookings for same worker-business pair in same month
Verify accept button is still enabled but shows warning

subtasks.notes: Created comprehensive verification script for 15-day warning. Verified implementation logic: at 15 days, getComplianceStatus returns 'warning' status (not 'blocked'), ComplianceWarningBanner renders with amber/yellow warning styles, and BookingActions accept button remains enabled (isComplianceBlocked = false). Script creates test data, verifies compliance_tracking table, calculate_days_worked function, and documents UI expectations for manual browser verification.

subtasks.description: Verify blocking at 21 days

steps: Setup: Create 21 accepted bookings for same worker-business pair in same month

subtasks.notes: Created comprehensive verification script for 21-day blocking. Verified implementation logic: at 21 days, getComplianceStatus returns 'blocked' status, ComplianceWarningBanner renders with red blocking styles, BookingActions accept button is disabled (isComplianceBlocked = true), AlternativeWorkersSuggestion appears when complianceIssue.status === 'blocked'. Script creates test data, verifies compliance_tracking table, calculate_days_worked function, getComplianceStatus returns 'blocked', and documents UI expectations for manual browser verification.

subtasks.description: Verify alternative workers are suggested when limit is reached

steps: Setup: Worker at 21-day limit for business
Attempt to accept worker who has reached limit
Verify suggested workers have not reached limit

subtasks.description: Verify monthly reset (new month = new counter)

steps: Setup: Worker at 21-day limit in February
Accept booking with start_date in March
Verify compliance_tracking shows 0 days for March

acceptance_criteria: Alternative workers suggested when limit reached
verification_strategy.reasoning: High risk change involving legal compliance. Manual end-to-end testing required to verify all compliance scenarios work correctly.
